updateInventoryWhenDeleteAndUnallocateBiospecimen

public static void updateInventoryWhenDeleteAndUnallocateBiospecimen(int intBiospecimenID,
                                                                     neuragenix.security.AuthToken authToken)
Update Inventory by increasing the number of available cell by 1. This is required in situations such as: - Delete biospecimen which was previously allocated in a cell. - Unallocate biospecimen which was previously allocated in a cell.
